document_data.name: Resist Injury
document_data.mainbody: '''''Resist injury''''' was a rare [[abjuration]] spell of the [[southern magic]] tradition.{{Southernmagic}}
document_data.Effects: When cast, the caster was protected from injury. The spell did not protect from certain spells. The caster was still vulnerable to charm, draining or death spells, such as ''[[death]]'' or ''[[disintegration]]''.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components, this spell required a [[material component]]. For the duration of the spell, the caster wore an [[amethyst]] or [[jade]] pendant.
